nodes.text: The Burning Plains were a region with heavy volcanic activity to the north of the Mensix Mining Facility on Mustafar. Blistmoks and other Mustafarian creatures could be found here.

The Burning Plains was a thin layer of crust floating on a sea of molten lava. Geologists expected that a major groundquake could cause the entire region to sink, leaving a gigantic lava ocean in its place.

The Burning Plains appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
